prompt: Create a vibrant 'Contact Us' page with light purple background (#EDE7F6). Feature centered 'Get in Touch' title in deep purple (#673AB7) with font size 32 and bold weight. Include grey subtitle (#757575) below inviting users to connect. Arrange three contact methods (Phone: +1 234 567 8900, Email: support@company.com, Address: 456 Main St, City, Country) in grid layout (2x1 for phone/email, full-width for address) with white cards having elevation 3 and rounded corners (radius 10). Use purple icons (#673AB7) for phone, email, location. Add contact form with Name, Email, Subject, Message fields using filled text fields with light purple backgrounds (#F3E5F5) and purple borders. Include full-width purple Send Message button with 18px padding and 14px vertical spacing.
